column1: The island of Aruba is one of the constituent countries of the Kingdom of the Netherlands in the southern Caribbean Sea. Aruba has no administrative subdivisions
column5: each of which has many neighborhoods within it. Many of these neighborhoods have names
column6: but are not considered by the Aruban government to be separate political or administrative entities. The capital of Aruba is the city of Oranjestad.

column2: with known neighborhoods listed beneath them.
